comment.name: AntdSegmented
comment.title: 分段控制器
comment.usage: 用于展示多个选项并允许用户选择其中单个选项

properties.name: style
properties.description: 样式

properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.description: 动态样式
properties.funcSig: AntdSegmentedStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdSegmented widget, AntdSegmentedStyle defaultStyle, AntdMapToken token)

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: 禁用

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: 只读

properties.name: defaultValue
properties.description: 默认值

properties.name: value
properties.description: 值

properties.name: autoCollect
properties.description: 自动同步值到表单

properties.name: onChange
properties.description: 变更事件

properties.name: shouldTriggerChange
properties.description: 当value手动控制的时候 是否应该触发onChange

properties.name: hapticFeedback
properties.description: 开启反馈

properties.name: items
properties.description: 分段选项列表，至少需要包含两个选项

properties.name: duration
properties.description: 选项切换时的动画过渡时长

demos.title: 受控的 Segmented

properties.name: value
properties.description: 绑定的value

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: 是否禁用该分段项，禁用时不可点击且样式变灰

properties.name: child
properties.description: 分段项中显示的子组件，通常是文字或图标

properties.name: inherit
properties.description: 是否继承样式,如果为false则不会向上合并其他的样式

properties.name: bodyStyle
properties.description: 分段控制器整体容器的样式配置

properties.name: bodyRowStyle
properties.description: 分段控制器内部横向排列的Flex布局样式配置

properties.name: itemStyle
properties.description: 单个分段项的默认样式配置

properties.name: activeItemStyle
properties.description: 当前选中的分段项的活动状态样式配置
